description:
Writing a Thesis or Dissertation doesn't have to be so hard, regardless of your major. This course outlines TEN SUCCESS TIPS that will help you finish your Dissertation or Thesis with ease. You will learn how to combat procrastination and commit to a writing schedule that works for you. Save yourself the headache! With these success strategies you CAN successfully achieve your higher education dreams.

This course contains engaging video lectures and many student activities all aimed at making sure that you practice the skills taught in this course and successfully complete your thesis or dissertation.

This course is designed for the serious graduate student who is ready and willing to learn the skills necessary to successfully complete their Thesis or Dissertation.
title: Ten Success Tips To Completing Your Dissertation or Thesis
